entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle at times mixed with snow changing to snow this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm except locally 5 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
